title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS libraries to pull, create, and run Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings; chat, stream, embed, create, push, and list models with a few lines of code.

title: jmorganca/ollama
summary: PyPI landing page for the official ollama Python package; same code as ollama/ollama-python repo.

title: ollama
summary: npm registry entry for the official ollama JavaScript SDK; browser & Node support.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; manage models, multi-user, dark/light themes, runs in Docker.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: LangChain integration page showing how to use Ollama as an LLM backend for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-haystack by deepset
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use any Ollama model as a Generator or Embedder in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot by sammcj
summary: GitHub Copilot CLI replacement that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions in VS Code.

title: ollama-chat by dgunning
summary: Lightweight React chat app that connects to Ollama via the REST API; supports streaming and markdown.

title: ollama-telegram by jacobtx
summary: Telegram bot that forwards messages to a local Ollama instance and streams replies back to users.

title: ollama4j by amithkoujalgi
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, micronaut & spring-boot starters, model management.

title: ollama-rb by robertosequeira
summary: Ruby gem providing a simple client for chat, generate, and embeddings endpoints of Ollama.

title: ollama-cli by mxyng
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around Ollama with readline history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-docker by technomancer
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support with one command.

title: ollama-helm by otiai10
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and ingress.

title: ollama-ex by mattludwigs
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama REST API for chat, generate, and embeddings with Tesla/Finch backends.

title: ollama-rs by peasead
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and list models.

title: ollama-csharp by asdf-community
summary: Community-maintained C# SDK for Ollama with .NET 6+ support and streaming chat completions.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama integrations and benchmarks.
